User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the GroupChat application.

email.description: The email address of the user.

avatar.description: URL to the user's avatar image.

online.description: Indicates if the user is currently online.

registrationDate.description: The date and time the user registered.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a message in the group chat.

authorId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message.

text.description: The text content of the message.

timestamp.description: The server timestamp when the message was sent.

Media.title: Media
Media.description: Represents a media file (photo or video) associated with a message.

id.description: Unique identifier for the media file.

url.description: The URL where the media file is stored.

uploadTimestamp.description: The date and time the media was uploaded.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. Uses path-based ownership for private user data.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user. This is the Firebase Auth UID.

definition.description: Stores messages for the group chat. Includes 'authorId' for authorization, allowing rules to verify the sender's identity.

params.name: messageId
params.description: The unique identifier of the message.
